item.title: Tres Lessons From Pied Piper Delete Key Hack
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: The teflon crew at Pied Piper suffered quite a bit during Season 2 of SILICON VALLEY. But there was no greater indignity than being brought to their knees by a tequila bottle. Since episode eight “White Hat/Black Hat” aired, many skeptical viewers have asked: how could something like this happen? Could a mindless error of pressing a delete key really cause a venerable company like Intersite to lose over nine thousand hours of content (including an irreplaceable archive of vintage yiffing videos)?
